SEARCH

Class Reservation

java.lang.Object
Reservation
public class Reservation extends Object
The Reservation class manages the creation and management of a flight reservation.
It handles associating a customer, flight, and payment method, as well as setting and displaying the reservation status.
Date: 4/17/2025

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Reservation()
    Default constructor that initializes a Reservation object with default values.

  • Constructor Details

    • Reservation

      public Reservation()
      Default constructor that initializes a Reservation object with default values. The payment method, flight, and customer are set to null, and the reservation is marked as not booked.

  • Method Details

    • setPayment

      public void setPayment(String paymentMethod)
      Sets the payment method for the reservation. This method ensures that a valid payment method is provided (non-null and non-empty).
      Parameters:
      paymentMethod - The payment method to be used for the reservation (e.g., "Credit Card", "Cash").
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the provided payment method is null or empty.

    • setBooked

      public void setBooked(boolean status)
      Sets the booking status of the reservation. This method marks the reservation as either booked or not based on the provided status.
      Parameters:
      status - A boolean indicating whether the reservation is booked (true) or not (false).

    • setPassenger

      public void setPassenger(Customer customer)
      Sets the customer making the reservation. This method ensures that the provided customer object is not null.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer making the reservation.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the provided customer is null.

    • setFlight

      public void setFlight(Flight flight)
      Sets the flight associated with the reservation. This method ensures that the provided flight object is not null.
      Parameters:
      flight - The flight to be associated with the reservation.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the provided flight is null.

    • makeReservation

      public void makeReservation(Customer customer, Flight flight, String paymentMethod)
      Creates a reservation by associating the customer, flight, and payment method. This method also sets the reservation status to booked.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer making the reservation.
      flight - The flight for the reservation.
      paymentMethod - The payment method to be used for the reservation.

    • displayReservationInfo

      public void displayReservationInfo()
      Displays the details of the reservation, including the booking status, payment method, customer name, and flight information.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method for testing the Reservation class functionality. It creates a customer, a flight, and a reservation, then makes a reservation and displays the reservation information.
